abcSeq
abc
----
{
  "type": "SeqTrace",
  "itemTraces": [
    {
      "type": "TextTrace",
      "span": {
        "from": 0,
        "to": 1
      },
      "error": null
    },
    {
      "type": "TextTrace",
      "span": {
        "from": 1,
        "to": 2
      },
      "error": null
    },
    {
      "type": "TextTrace",
      "span": {
        "from": 2,
        "to": 3
      },
      "error": null
    }
  ],
  "span": {
    "from": 0,
    "to": 3
  },
  "error": null
}

abcChoice
a
----
{
  "type": "ChoiceTrace",
  "error": null,
  "innerTrace": {
    "type": "TextTrace",
    "span": {
      "from": 0,
      "to": 1
    },
    "error": null
  },
  "optIdx": 0,
  "span": {
    "from": 0,
    "to": 1
  }
}

digit
2
----
{
  "type": "CharTrace",
  "span": {
    "from": 0,
    "to": 1
  },
  "error": null
}

intLit
1234
----
{
  "type": "RepSepTrace",
  "repTraces": [
    {
      "type": "CharTrace",
      "span": {
        "from": 0,
        "to": 1
      },
      "error": null
    },
    {
      "type": "CharTrace",
      "span": {
        "from": 1,
        "to": 2
      },
      "error": null
    },
    {
      "type": "CharTrace",
      "span": {
        "from": 2,
        "to": 3
      },
      "error": null
    },
    {
      "type": "CharTrace",
      "span": {
        "from": 3,
        "to": 4
      },
      "error": null
    }
  ],
  "sepTraces": [],
  "error": null,
  "span": {
    "from": 0,
    "to": 4
  }
}

stringLit
"fooBarBaz"
----
{
  "type": "SeqTrace",
  "itemTraces": [
    {
      "type": "TextTrace",
      "span": {
        "from": 0,
        "to": 1
      },
      "error": null
    },
    {
      "type": "RepSepTrace",
      "repTraces": [
        {
          "type": "ChoiceTrace",
          "error": null,
          "innerTrace": {
            "type": "ChoiceTrace",
            "error": null,
            "innerTrace": {
              "type": "CharTrace",
              "span": {
                "from": 1,
                "to": 2
              },
              "error": null
            },
            "optIdx": 0,
            "span": {
              "from": 1,
              "to": 2
            }
          },
          "optIdx": 0,
          "span": {
            "from": 1,
            "to": 2
          }
        },
        {
          "type": "ChoiceTrace",
          "error": null,
          "innerTrace": {
            "type": "ChoiceTrace",
            "error": null,
            "innerTrace": {
              "type": "CharTrace",
              "span": {
                "from": 2,
                "to": 3
              },
              "error": null
            },
            "optIdx": 0,
            "span": {
              "from": 2,
              "to": 3
            }
          },
          "optIdx": 0,
          "span": {
            "from": 2,
            "to": 3
          }
        },
        {
          "type": "ChoiceTrace",
          "error": null,
          "innerTrace": {
            "type": "ChoiceTrace",
            "error": null,
            "innerTrace": {
              "type": "CharTrace",
              "span": {
                "from": 3,
                "to": 4
              },
              "error": null
            },
            "optIdx": 0,
            "span": {
              "from": 3,
              "to": 4
            }
          },
          "optIdx": 0,
          "span": {
            "from": 3,
            "to": 4
          }
        },
        {
          "type": "ChoiceTrace",
          "error": null,
          "innerTrace": {
            "type": "ChoiceTrace",
            "error": null,
            "innerTrace": {
              "type": "CharTrace",
              "span": {
                "from": 4,
                "to": 5
              },
              "error": null
            },
            "optIdx": 1,
            "span": {
              "from": 4,
              "to": 5
            }
          },
          "optIdx": 0,
          "span": {
            "from": 4,
            "to": 5
          }
        },
        {
          "type": "ChoiceTrace",
          "error": null,
          "innerTrace": {
            "type": "ChoiceTrace",
            "error": null,
            "innerTrace": {
              "type": "CharTrace",
              "span": {
                "from": 5,
                "to": 6
              },
              "error": null

            "optIdx": 0,

              "from": 5,

            "from": 5,
            "to": 6
          }
        },
        {
          "type": "ChoiceTrace",
          "error": null,
          "innerTrace": {
            "type": "ChoiceTrace",
            "error": null,
            "innerTrace": {
              "type": "CharTrace",
              "span": {
                "from": 6,
                "to": 7
              },
              "error": null

            "optIdx": 0,

              "from": 6,

          "optIdx": 0,

            "from": 6,

          }

        {
          "type": "ChoiceTrace",
          "error": null,
          "innerTrace": {
            "type": "ChoiceTrace",

              "type": "CharTrace",
              "span": {
                "from": 7,

              "error": null

              "from": 7,

          "optIdx": 0,
          "span": {
            "from": 7,
            "to": 8
          }
        },
        {
          "type": "ChoiceTrace",
          "error": null,
          "innerTrace": {
            "type": "ChoiceTrace",
            "error": null,
            "innerTrace": {
              "type": "CharTrace",
              "span": {
                "from": 8,
                "to": 9
              },
              "error": null
            },
            "optIdx": 0,
            "span": {
              "from": 8,
              "to": 9
            }
          },
          "optIdx": 0,
          "span": {
            "from": 8,
            "to": 9
          }

        {
          "type": "ChoiceTrace",
          "error": null,
          "innerTrace": {
            "type": "ChoiceTrace",
            "error": null,

                "from": 9,

              "error": null

              "from": 9,

          "optIdx": 0,
          "span": {
            "from": 9,
            "to": 10
          }
        }
      ],
      "sepTraces": [],
      "error": null,
      "span": {
        "from": 1,
        "to": 10
      }
    },
    {
      "type": "TextTrace",
      "span": {
        "from": 10,
        "to": 11
      },
      "error": null
    }
  ],
  "span": {
    "from": 0,
    "to": 11
  },
  "error": null
}

intOrString
123
----
{
  "type": "ChoiceTrace",
  "error": null,
  "innerTrace": {
    "type": "RepSepTrace",
    "repTraces": [
      {
        "type": "CharTrace",
        "span": {
          "from": 0,
          "to": 1
        },
        "error": null
      },
      {
        "type": "CharTrace",
        "span": {
          "from": 1,
          "to": 2
        },
        "error": null
      },
      {
        "type": "CharTrace",
        "span": {
          "from": 2,
          "to": 3
        },
        "error": null
      }
    ],
    "sepTraces": [],
    "error": null,
    "span": {
      "from": 0,
      "to": 3
    }
  },
  "optIdx": 1,
  "span": {
    "from": 0,
    "to": 3
  }
}

intOrString
"foobar"
----
{
  "type": "ChoiceTrace",
  "error": null,
  "innerTrace": {
    "type": "SeqTrace",
    "itemTraces": [
      {
        "type": "TextTrace",
        "span": {
          "from": 0,
          "to": 1
        },
        "error": null
      },
      {
        "type": "RepSepTrace",
        "repTraces": [
          {
            "type": "ChoiceTrace",
            "error": null,
            "innerTrace": {
              "type": "ChoiceTrace",
              "error": null,
              "innerTrace": {
                "type": "CharTrace",
                "span": {
                  "from": 1,
                  "to": 2
                },
                "error": null
              },
              "optIdx": 0,
              "span": {
                "from": 1,
                "to": 2
              }
            },
            "optIdx": 0,
            "span": {
              "from": 1,
              "to": 2
            }
          },
          {
            "type": "ChoiceTrace",
            "error": null,
            "innerTrace": {
              "type": "ChoiceTrace",
              "error": null,
              "innerTrace": {
                "type": "CharTrace",
                "span": {
                  "from": 2,
                  "to": 3
                },
                "error": null
              },
              "optIdx": 0,
              "span": {
                "from": 2,
                "to": 3
              }
            },
            "optIdx": 0,
            "span": {
              "from": 2,
              "to": 3
            }
          },
          {
            "type": "ChoiceTrace",
            "error": null,
            "innerTrace": {
              "type": "ChoiceTrace",
              "error": null,
              "innerTrace": {
                "type": "CharTrace",
                "span": {
                  "from": 3,
                  "to": 4
                },
                "error": null
              },
              "optIdx": 0,
              "span": {
                "from": 3,
                "to": 4
              }
            },
            "optIdx": 0,
            "span": {
              "from": 3,
              "to": 4
            }
          },
          {
            "type": "ChoiceTrace",
            "error": null,
            "innerTrace": {
              "type": "ChoiceTrace",
              "error": null,
              "innerTrace": {
                "type": "CharTrace",
                "span": {
                  "from": 4,
                  "to": 5
                },
                "error": null
              },
              "optIdx": 0,
              "span": {
                "from": 4,
                "to": 5
              }
            },
            "optIdx": 0,
            "span": {
              "from": 4,
              "to": 5
            }
          },
          {
            "type": "ChoiceTrace",
            "error": null,
            "innerTrace": {
              "type": "ChoiceTrace",
              "error": null,
              "innerTrace": {
                "type": "CharTrace",
                "span": {
                  "from": 5,
                  "to": 6
                },
                "error": null
              },
              "optIdx": 0,
              "span": {
                "from": 5,
                "to": 6
              }
            },
            "optIdx": 0,
            "span": {
              "from": 5,
              "to": 6
            }
          },
          {
            "type": "ChoiceTrace",
            "error": null,
            "innerTrace": {
              "type": "ChoiceTrace",
              "error": null,
              "innerTrace": {
                "type": "CharTrace",
                "span": {
                  "from": 6,
                  "to": 7
                },
                "error": null
              },
              "optIdx": 0,
              "span": {
                "from": 6,
                "to": 7
              }
            },
            "optIdx": 0,
            "span": {
              "from": 6,
              "to": 7
            }
          }
        ],
        "sepTraces": [],
        "error": null,
        "span": {
          "from": 1,
          "to": 7
        }
      },
      {
        "type": "TextTrace",
        "span": {
          "from": 7,
          "to": 8
        },
        "error": null
      }
    ],
    "span": {
      "from": 0,
      "to": 8
    },
    "error": null
  },
  "optIdx": 0,
  "span": {
    "from": 0,
    "to": 8
  }
}
